name: 2022 IEEE 2nd International Conference on Educational Technology (IEEE ICET 2022)
content: Conference Proceedings: The submission will be under a careful reviewing process, all accepted papers after double-blind peer review with proper registration and presentation, will be collected in the IEEE conference proceedings, and then reviewed and included in IEEE Xplore, indexed by Ei Compendex, and Scopus, etc. major databases. Special Issue: The Program Committee will select the best papers from the conference registered papers and ask authors to extend the papers. The papers will be published in the special issues as follows: Sustainability (ISSN 2071-1050) High visibility: Scopus, SCIE and SSCI (Web of Science), GEOBASE, Inspec, AGRIS, RePEc, CAPlus / SciFinder, and many other databases. CiteScore: 3.2 Impact Factor: 2.576 Education Sciences (ISSN 2227-7102) High visibility: Scopus, ESCI (Web of Science), ERIC, Educational Research Abstracts, and many other databases.
